name: Handful Players
description: Handful Players, founded in 2007, is a community based nonprofit organization utilizing Performing Arts, including acting, song, dance, writing, spoken word, clowning and puppetry for underserved African American, Latino and Asian K-12 youth and their families, in the Western Addition. Our purpose is to use the vehicle of Performing Arts Education to promote inclusion, build life skills, enhance a sense of self and mindfulness, nurture and develop positive potential to address disparities in the
